|- id="Cuijue Slope"
| [[File:Cuijue Slope.png|180px]]<br />[[Cuijue Slope]]
| Located within the heart of this region are the Nine Pillars and a temple to the center. While within the vicinity of the pillars, the sky will darken.
|- id="Jueyun Karst"
| [[File:Jueyun Karst.png|180px]]<br />[[Jueyun Karst]]
| It is said to be the place where the [[adepti]] live. Normally no one dares to try to set foot here, but some brave or desperate people still try to seek the adepti for good fortune.
|- id="Huaguang Stone Forest"
| [[File:Huaguang Stone Forest.png|180px]]<br />[[Huaguang Stone Forest]]
| Surrounded by three mountains: [[Mt. Aocang]] to the north, [[Qingyun Peak]] to the east, and [[Mt. Hulao]] to the southwest.
|- id="Mt. Aocang"
| [[File:Mt. Aocang.png|180px]]<br />[[Mt. Aocang]]
| Home of the [[Adeptus]] [[Cloud Retainer]].
|- id="Mt. Hulao"
| [[File:Mt. Hulao.png|180px]]<br />[[Mt. Hulao]]
| The large pieces of [[Amber Rock]] found along the mountain are formed by flowers [[Mountain Shaper]] planted to keep out intruders.
|- id="Nantianmen"
| [[File:Nantianmen.png|180px]]<br />[[Nantianmen]]
| This region notably features the [[Dragon-Queller]], a large tree used to seal [[Azhdaha]], whom [[Jiu]] worships. The dragon has begun merging with the tree, using its roots to connect to the ley lines and draw power from them.
|- id="Qingyun Peak"
| [[File:Qingyun Peak.png|180px]]<br />[[Qingyun Peak]]
| Home of the [[Adeptus]] [[Moon Carver]]. Also features the Dwelling in the Clouds — a small floating island high above this mountain, which was created by [[Cloud Retainer]] at an unknown point in the past.
|- id="Tianqiu Valley"
| [[File:Tianqiu Valley.png|180px]]<br />[[Tianqiu Valley]]
| Located in the southeastern part of Minlin.
|}
